derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Greek, from metatithenai 'transpose, change the position of'

means.word_mean: 1. a linguistic process of transposition of sounds or syllables within a word or words within a sentence
2. a chemical reaction between two compounds in which parts of each are interchanged to form two new compounds (AB+CD=AD+CB)
